title: Basic Filipino to English Translation Quiz
description: Test your skills in translating basic Filipino words into English. This quiz is designed for beginners.
instructions: Write the English translation of the word.
The case (uppercase or lowercase) of your answer does not matter, as long as the spelling is correct.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for scoring.
